search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Virtuous CRM (virtuous-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Virtuous CRM is: [https://virtuous.org/pricing](https://virtuous.org/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Responsive pricing  
customized for you.
========================================

Discovering your unique needs is the first step  
toward providing you with the most cost-efficient solution.

![Image 17](https://virtuous.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/starter-image-filled.svg) Starter
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Under 5k Contacts
-----------------

[Talk to Sales Talk to Sales](https://virtuous.org/demo/)

Ideal for smaller nonprofits looking for an integrated platform designed to unify fundraising and marketing to drive growth.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Up to 5 users and includes 1,000 supporter records
*   Dedicated coach for onboarding
*   4 automation workflows
*   Send up to 5,000 emails to your supporters each month

![Image 18](https://virtuous.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/pro-image-filled.svg) Platform
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

5k-30k Contacts
---------------

[Get a Quote Get a Quote](https://virtuous.org/demo/)

Best for growing non-profits looking for an integrated and responsive platform designed for scale and impact.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Unlimited users
*   Unlimited automation workflows
*   Dedicated success coach with ongoing bi-annual goal reviews
*   Live, customized team training
*   Expanded fundraising tools

![Image 19](https://virtuous.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/enterprise-image-filled.svg) Enterprise
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

30k - Millions
--------------

[Get a Quote Get a Quote](https://virtuous.org/demo/)

Optimized to support large nonprofit teams who need a strategic growth partner to help them drive impact at scale
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Enterprise-grade, yet integrated and user friendly platform
*   Unlimited users
*   Dedicated success manager, priority support, and quarterly reviews
*   Open API and custom integrations
*   3rd party reports, intel, and backups
*   Chapters and multi-org management
*   Consultant tools for agency support
*   Live, customized team training and implementation consultation

Our Customers Love Us
---------------------

In the 2024 G2 Spring Report, Virtuous was named the #1 Momentum Leader in the nonprofit CRM category and received a total of 15 badges including “High Performer”, “Users Love Us”, and “Most Likely to Recommend”.

Expect more

Virtuous gives you the nonprofit CRM, fundraising, volunteer, and marketing tools you need to create responsive experiences that build trust and grow impact.

Enterprise-grade business intelligence and analytics to improve decision-making.

Over 2,000 Nonprofits trust Virtuous

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What kind of support is included?

We pride ourselves on the comprehensive support we provide our users. Our US-based customer success team offers hands-on support as well as a ticket-based support system that’s fully integrated into the Virtuous platform. Our success team is committed to ensuring that you reach your fundraising and organizational goals. To help along the way, we provide regular phone or video meetings for your key team members.

Is the onboarding cost required?

Think of it as an investment in your success. The best system migrations we’ve seen include high-touch training and data migration services that mitigate any potential risks for your nonprofit. With the help of our onboarding team, you can be sure that all your valuable data is accurately mapped and fully integrated when you switch to Virtuous. They’ll also provide personalized training for your team to make sure you’re set up for success.

What software does Virtuous typically replace?

Virtuous replaces your donor management system, but as an all-in-one platform, it can also do much more. Virtuous can replace your email marketing and online giving platforms as well. If you love your current email marketing or online giving solutions, that’s great! We integrate with the most popular providers on the planet. We are happy to help you set up a successful integration.

What is the contract term length?

Committing to a full year of Virtuous maximizes the value and ROI of the platform for your team. Contact our team to learn more about our payment options.

Grow generosity with Virtuous
-----------------------------

Virtuous is the responsive fundraising software platform proven to help nonprofit organizations increase generosity by serving all donors personally, no matter their gift size.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is customized based on the organization's needs and size.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Ideal for smaller nonprofits looking for an integrated platform designed to unify fundraising and marketing to drive growth.
features: Send up to 5,000 emails to supporters each month

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Best for growing non-profits looking for an integrated and responsive platform designed for scale and impact.
features: Dedicated success coach with ongoing bi-annual goal reviews

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Optimized to support large nonprofit teams who need a strategic growth partner to help them drive impact at scale.
features: Enterprise-grade, yet integrated and user-friendly platform
Dedicated success manager, priority support, and quarterly reviews
Live, customized team training and implementation consultation
